The warming sun returns again
And melts away the snow
The sea is freed from icy chains
Winter is letting go

Standing on the ocean side
We can hear the waves
Calling us out with tide
To sail into our fate

Oden! Guide our ships
Our axes, spears and swords
Guide us through storms that whip
And in brutal war

Our ships await us by the shore
Time has come to leave
Our country, family and homes
For riches in the east

Some of us won't return
But that won't bring us down
Our fate is written in the web
Woven by the Norns

A ram is sacrificed
Across the longship's bow
And as we set our sails
A strong breeze starts to blow

It carries us out to sea
With hope of fame and pride
And glorious all will be
That with sword in hand will die

Oden! Guide our ships
Our Axes, spears and swords
Guide us through storms that whip
And in brutal war

a lot of people have laid blame on phil anselmo for his comments about dime just a week before the shooting. pantera is one of my favorite bands, top ten even, and i had to know what phil had going on after the tragedy. i found this one comment, the only thing he has said so far since the shooting, to the press anyway, and thought i would share this with everyone. dont blame phil, blame psychotic section 8 marine who had no useful purpose in society other than to rob us of a living legend. - Philip isn't hiding out or waiting for the right moment to speak, he's in Texas right now searching for answers to this tragedy the best he can. There was one thing he asked of me, that I humbly bring to you all: Darrell my brother. The best of the best. -Philip H Anselmo rest in peace dimebag

well i have gone back to selling drugs...

it isnt like i have anything better to do...

ive been stuck in albuquerque for a straight week, because my boss/friend lost his car keys, and mazda wanted 400 bucks for a new set. new cars, ug...

this thanksgiving, i realized that i had nothing to be thankful for...

its cold here... reminds me a bit of montana... too many mexicans tho...

thinking about moving away from phoenix... going to apply for my canadian citizenship, maybe german too... i gotta get out of this place, if its the last thing i ever do...

i had my face an inch away from a black forest cobra last week... that was fun...

anyway...

in the words of kim jong il, im so ronery, so ronery, yeah im a rittre ronery....

dear commercial producers,

i never buy anything you fuckers spam me with every 10 minutes or so, so why dont you give up and stop spamming me altogether.

thanks.

i shaved my head again... not all the way, but enough...

im resigned to this whole single-or-die thing... it finally came to acceptance, sigh...

im buckethead for halloween again this year... last time i was buckethead was 1999... we made jungle juice and everyone was there... i dont expect the same results this year... i dont expect anything anymore... 

today is for me, and fuck everyone else...

i went to marilyn manson with that girl tonight... she brought her friend, some guy i forget his name already... she ignored me all night, and ran around talking to all her friends... ive never been surrounded by so many people and felt so alone...

i spent a hundred bux on these tickets... she doesnt even care that i havent eaten ANYTHING in FIVE DAYS because i spent all the money i had left on them, hoping to show her a good time, and instead, she left me alone, after the concert i sat by her car for over an hour, while she ran to the bar with all her friends...

what is so wrong with me? why do girls just shit on me? why do i have to be so lonely and sad? i am so easily forgetable...

i bought tickets to marilyn manson today. meagan and i are going together, it should be fun.

in other happenings, <lj user="adzix"> and i are going to work on tracks together for an upcoming remixwars.com compilation. if we are the shit, like we know we are, we will make the cut. deadline is halloween, but we will be ready before that. more info on this soon.

especially the spoof on the rent play omfg that shit is funny

someone stole my fucking truck.

someone is going to get hung upside-down from my shower, as i slit their throat to drain out their blood, and then proceed to chop up their body into hamburger sized chunks, and distribute them to various dumpsters throughout the city...

and if they ever find out that someone died, and manage to put them down below, i will defecate on someones grave as maggots feast on someones rotting carcass...

you're all fucking dying....

i am finalizing the pre-production process, storyboards and all the typing to put it into a nice little binder. prepro is the absolute worst. i hope if i ever have to do it again, i am operating with more overhead and a better contract.

renting an acura nsx for a 1 day shoot is outrageously expensive, but perhaps, worth the cost.

and i never want to do screenplays, unless its my own movie. commercial work BLOWS. at least, that has been my experience.

i want ice cream.

mel and devin wrote me an email today.

blah.

There's no need to argue anymore. 
I gave all I could, but it left me so sore. 
And the thing that makes me mad, 
Is the one thing that I had, 

I knew, I knew, 
I'd lose you. 
You'll always be special to me, 
Special to me, to me. 

And I remember all the things we once shared, 
Watching T.V. movies on the living room armchair. 
But they say it will work out fine. 
Was it all a waste of time. 

'Cause I knew, I knew, 
I'd lose you. 
You'll always be special to me, 
Special to me, to me. 

Will I forget in time, ah, 
You said I was on your mind? 
There's no need to argue, 
No need to argue anymore. 
There's no need to argue anymore.

while i was in billings i found out that slayer is going to be there in december.

i saw slayer in wyoming, of all the places in the world. i got to stand right at the front of the stage on the left (facing out from stage), and got to see fear factory and kilgore open. ff is like definately in my top 10, and kilgore was a new band i just heard. i stood in the pit for almost 4 hours, getting beat to death by big huge metalheads, and damn near passed out from being crushed against the barricade. that was possibly the best show ive ever seen.

im glad to see, along with all the bullshit, that the town is changing. 

now if everyone would stop being dumb and hitting up all the time, something might eventually happening that billings wouldnt be a bad place to be.

if you get the opportunity, dont ever go.

collins college is fucking with the students some more.

my friend sunchi told me that now, on top of a 4 grand tuition every session (5 weeks), they are making the students BUY copies of the software, and if they want to use the programs, they have to use their dongle. bullshit. that shit is supposed to be covered in tuition, and it would be significantly cheaper to just go buy the software and learn it yourself. especially considering that the teachers are unqualified to teach these subjects, since they have little to no experience.

i cannot wait to protest outside the school. 

breaker 1 9 this is the G dub and im comin to drop the hammer down

im getting old. i am feeling old. my body is feeling old and im looking old.

im tired of being lonely. but i must admit im not the strapping young lad i once was.

my head is fucked up, has been for years, since the accident. i remember how things used to be, how i used to be. 

how i am different...

im having problems with my kidneys. it started with the salmonella poisoning, and since its been worsening. im not saying this to be funny. my pee smells of arsenic or something, and my kindneys hurt to the touch.

i can feel that supposed lump on my left pelvic bone the doctors told me about after the accident. it is noticeable.

im much weaker than i was even 6 months ago.

nobody loves me anymore.

i went around a bit while i was in billings, to some familiar places. memory lane if you will. it seems so distant, like an afterthought. my memories are fading, for lack of new ones to be had. thinking about the past isnt enough to keep it preserved. 

im waiting for that moment of clarity.

some have said i am my own obstacle, that i stand in my own way when it comes to success. if only they saw as i see, that there is no success.

i want babies, big house with a pickett fence, and a dog. i want what i cant have, and it wont be long before the opportunity is gone.

especially at my rapid rate of descent.

so tired.... so tired...

just got home from my trip to montana.

it took less than 24 hours for me to be reminded why i left and why i will never live there again. junkies fucking everywhere with their hep c and all that nastiness.

hooked up with killa c on the plane there, from denver. he just dropped a new cd, features from tech n9ne and shit, its dope. hopefully hookin up with him to drop some shit down here in az.

saw a lot of good homies. stevo, ambrose, big baby jesus, enciphilitous, frohg, toe knee. good times with weed and good buds.

ran into some problems on the way home, blew out some engine shit, got stuck in butte montana OMFG i hate that place. i have never seen uglier people in my life, and never had to go through so much bullshit for a 30$ fucking part and 50$ worth of labor. in the end, i fixed the shit myself. 

spent last night in slc. that place is a shithole. not just the city either, whole fucking state sucks.

got up at 6 this morning and mashed all the way here. got pulled over just outside phx by some overzealous pro-bush/cheney buttfucker. gave me a ticket for "following too close". imma dip up in the court and be like, "prove it bitch". fuck the police.

just stepped on a safety pin. i need to stop leaving these things laying around all over the place.

im dirty. and i offend myself. time for a shower.

ive got salmonella poisoning. it sucks, im throwing up a lot and my stomach hurts really bad, all the time.

im leaving for montana tomorrow to go get my car. ill be gone for several days since i plan on taking my time driving back here to phoenix.

I'm so lonesome I could cry

I've never seen a night so long
When time goes crawling by
The moon just went behind the cloud
To hide it's face and cry

Did you every hear a robin weep
When leaves begin to die
That means he's lost the will to live
I'm so lonesome I could cry

The silence of a falling star
Lights up the purple sky
And as I wonder where you are
I'm so lonesome I could cry

Lost, here is nowhere 
Searching home still 
Turning past me, all are gone 
Time is now 
The omen showed, took me away 
Preparations are done, this can't last 
The mere reflection brought disgust 
No ordeal to conquer, this firm slit 
It sheds upon the floor, dripping into a pool 
Grant me sleep, take me under 
Like the wings of a dove, folding around 
I fade into this tender care

for the first time in almost a year.

i dont know what to think.

everyone forgot my birthday, as usual. not even my own family bothered to contact me.

the only thing left to look forward to are senior citizen discounts and prostate exams. wee...

emily sent me an email tonight, though i think it was unintentional. no text, nothing but a blank email. nice depressing end to a horrible day.

is there nothing left in the world i can find comfort in?

do your homework. every single day here in america, this country slides further and further down the road to tyranny. we are living in a police state. september 11 didnt happen the way that the mainstream media and the federal government wants us to believe. george bush and his administration green lighted the terrorist attack in manhattan, not unlike they did in waco texas, or oklahoma city. evidence? it is everywhere you look. for instance, there were 12 surveillance cameras surrounding the a p murroh federal building in oklahoma city. the federal government confiscated all of the tapes, and when they put mcveigh on trial, refused to allow the footage into evidence, citing national security. no fucking way a fucking truck bomb, in a ryder truck, would blow a building in half like that. those were internal explosions. prove me wrong. please. more evidence? the pentagon, sept. 11, 2001. supposedly, a boeing 757 crashed into the side of the building, yet, it is plain to see to anyone willing to look at the photos, there is no evidence that a 115 foot wide (wingspan), 45 foot high (tail), crashed into the pentagon. look at the photos. there is no wreckage from a plane outside the building. 86 million btu, thousands of gallons of jet fuel, wouldve burned everything it came in contact with. yet if you examine photographic evidence, you can see with the visible eye, on any still or video, from any media agency, that the hole in the side of the pentagon was no larger that 65 feet wide, and 55 feet high. look for yourself. right on the inside of the building, perfect condition furniture, computer monitors, filing cabinets. certainly, these items would be cooked to an unrecognisable state by the 3000+ degree temperatures generated by thousands of gallons of burning jet fuel. the planes that hit the world trade center. more evidence here. why, when they impacted the building, was there an explosion at the nose of the plane? well, to ignite the jet fuel coming in behind the fuselage. building number 7, wtc. never impacted by any aircraft or any other objects, came down like it was scheduled for demolition, a process which takes weeks of planning to prepare and execute. yet, the building came down, 9/11/01, and it went like clockwork. federal officials, caught on camera saying they decided to "pull" that structure. how could they "pull" it, unless they had already set it up prior to the attack. the patriot act is an evisceration of the constitution and the bill of rights. all cell phones produced after 2001 are required to have satellite tracking systems in place so they can keep tabs on us. in washington dc, government schools are forcing kids to get id badges, and use thumb print recognition systems just so they can have lunch. throughout texas, there are military training excersizes under way to prepare the marines, local police, and other government assets for the eventuality of placing american civilians into nazi-esque slave camps. its documented. happened in seattle, happened in oakland, happened in miami. resist the system. never turn in your firearms. read the fucking constitution sometime. know your rights. they are about to be violated. look around, its a new world order. the euro, the takeover of mideast nations for control of oil, retinal scans, voice identification, facial recognition systems. are you prepared to be enslaved? you better wake up, you already are. --- i've decided to add a link here, for you skeptics. dont believe me. see for yourselves. read me!

sleeping is so much better than anything...

sometimes, i sleep for hours and hours, on occassion, i've slept for more than 36 hours at a time...

i love it when i sleep that long... when i unfortunately wake up, my heart is usually beating slow, but hard... times like that, if i could just sleep a bit longer, i wouldnt have to wake up at all...

avp was a total let down... my first screenplay as a college freshman had a better plot... the eye candy was ok, but even with points there, its still two thumbs down...
open water was equally disappointing... its really just not that entertaining to watch two people floating in a pool for an hour and a half..

hero should be good, although i dont quite understand why they went with a pg-13 movie... especially after kill bill, possibly the most gore per minute film ever...

speaking of movies... we just finished our 8 min short film for the scottsdale film festival... we submitted it yesteday... it looks ok for our first time out with substandard equipment and zero budget, not to mention the entire thing was written, produced, and edited in a week... ill post it online whenever i get around to compressing it for the web...

reality is setting in, yet again...

phoenix sucks... its been over 100 for like 3+ months straight. it maybe rained 4 times, and only once did it rain for more than half an hour.

so once again im considering my options.

i hate math, yet i constantly find myself doing it, without even being asked. whats wrong with me?

so here are some figures... oh but first, lets say that every time i fill up my tank it costs me 26.98$ (thats 1.90$ per gallon on a 14.2 gallon tank) lets also assume that i am retarded and should have brought my car with me to phoenix rather than leaving it in montana. so, to have my car delivered to me here in phoenix i have to foot the bill of 230.00$ (thats an over-estimation, actually it is 215.84$, err on the side of caution)

ok...

billings - phoenix - billings (i have to drop my buddy off at home) - toronto = 4,290.21 miles
billings - phoenix - billings (again, with the buddy and stuff) - boston = 4747.22 miles

wee...

now, assuming that its about 27 bux a tank, and a 14.2 gallon tank, i still have to calculate the mileage...

lets aim low, lets say 22mpg (i know its more like 28, but as i said before, err on the side of caution)
ok so 22mpg means ill get about 312.4 miles on a completely full tank. damn...
 
13.73 fill ups to toronto = 370.44$ in gas
15.20 full ups to boston = 410.10$ in gas

this is entirely unrealistic, because everyone knows something always goes wrong... never make plans, cuz as soon as you do, thats when things fall apart...


better to figure at least 50$ overage just for gas and oil and the like. 

fucking shit man, why cant i find a place to move to and just stay there?

i found a baby sparrow outside.

i didn't want the cat to get it, so i put it in my room and am trying to take care of it. tomorrow ill call a shelter before i go to work.

hope it makes it thru the nite.

You have a Lost Soul. No one is really sure what
that can always mean, because it can be defined
in many ways. As Legend goes, lost souls were
the spirits of passed away people who are
neither in heaven nor hell. They walk the
earth, brooding mysteriously, always appearing
when you expect it least. So hence, if you have
a Lost Soul, then you are probably very
insecure and shy. Stuck in your own little box,
you watch the world fly by as a loner. You dont
know your place. You seemingly dont have a
place in society or an interest. You are a very
capricious person, and are confused and
frustrated about where you belong. You crave
for the sense and feeling of home-but have not
obtained it yet.

In the corner beside my window 
There hangs a lonely photograph 
There is no reason 
I'd never notice a memory that could hold me back 

There is a wound that's always bleeding 
There is a road I'm always walking 
And I know you'll never return to this place 

Gone through days without talking 
There is a comfort in silence 
So used to losing all ambition 
And struggling to maintain what's left

There is a wound that's always bleeding 
There is a road I'm always walking 
And I know you'll never return to this place 

Once undone, theres only smoke 
Burning in my eyes to blind 
To cover up what really happened 
And force the darkness unto me

There is a wound that's always bleeding 
There is a road I'm always walking 
And I know you'll never return to this place

lately i find myself reliving days of old.

i seem to be in the same position i was in during my elementary school years. i never leave the house, well, rarelly. i spend all my time alone in my room finding ways to keep myself busy and pass the hours by. increasingly, i am becoming antisocial unlike i've ever been.

sometimes i wonder what would happen if i were just gone. i am never going to change the world, or for that matter, even leave much of a mark on it. ive nothing to offer anymore. im in college, yet im almost 26, and i still have no idea "what i want to be when i grow up".

days like this make me realize just how easy it would be to let myself die.
